00013 void TwoDStatsGeneration::calculatePlayerImpactPtsFromIndices(std::vector<std::vector<cv::Point3f> > &_inputPlayerBallPts,
00014                                                               std::vector<std::vector<int> > &_playerDeepestPtIndices,
00015                                                               std::vector<cv::Point> &o_playerImpactPtsAllRallies)
00016 {
00017     if(_playerDeepestPtIndices.size() != 0)
00018     {
00019         for(int i = 0;i<_playerDeepestPtIndices.size();i++)
00020         {
00021             for(int j=0;j<_playerDeepestPtIndices[i].size();j++)
00022             {
00023 
00024                 // if the impact point index is not -1, then there is an impact point for this rally
00025                 if(_playerDeepestPtIndices[i][j] != -1)
00026                 {
00027                     o_playerImpactPtsAllRallies.push_back(cv::Point((int)(_inputPlayerBallPts[i][_playerDeepestPtIndices[i][j]]).x,(int)(_inputPlayerBallPts[i][_playerDeepestPtIndices[i][j]]).y));
00028                 }
00029                 else
00030                 {
00031                     std::cout<<"No impact point for Rally number:"<<i<<"..so skipping to next rally.\n";
00032                 }
00033 
00034             }
00035         }
00036     }
00037     else
00038     {
00039         std::cout<<"No data in indices array for the player.\n";
00040     }
00041 }

00045 void TwoDStatsGeneration::generatePercentageDistribution(int _widthBounds, int _heightBounds,
00046                                                          std::vector<cv::Point> &_playerImpactPtsAllRallies,
00047                                                          int _whichQuadrant,
00048                                                          std::vector<cv::Point>& o_specificQuadPts,
00049                                                          float& o_percentage)
00050 {
00051 
00052     switch(_whichQuadrant)
00053     {
00054         //bottom left
00055         case 0:
00056         {
00057             for(int i=0;i<_playerImpactPtsAllRallies.size();i++)
00058             {
00059                 if((_playerImpactPtsAllRallies[i].x <= _widthBounds) && (_playerImpactPtsAllRallies[i].y <= _heightBounds))
00060                 {
00061                     // if it falls into the requested quadrant then fill in the buffer
00062                     o_specificQuadPts.push_back(_playerImpactPtsAllRallies[i]);
00063                 }
00064             }
00065             break;
00066         }
00067         // top left
00068         case 1:
00069         {
00070             for(int i=0;i<_playerImpactPtsAllRallies.size();i++)
00071             {
00072                 if((_playerImpactPtsAllRallies[i].x <= _widthBounds) && (_playerImpactPtsAllRallies[i].y >= _heightBounds))
00073                 {
00074                     // if it falls into the requested quadrant then fill in the buffer
00075                     o_specificQuadPts.push_back(_playerImpactPtsAllRallies[i]);
00076                 }
00077             }
00078             break;
00079 
00080         }
00081         // top right
00082         case 2:
00083         {
00084             for(int i=0;i<_playerImpactPtsAllRallies.size();i++)
00085             {
00086                 if((_playerImpactPtsAllRallies[i].x > _widthBounds) && (_playerImpactPtsAllRallies[i].y > _heightBounds))
00087                 {
00088                     // if it falls into the requested quadrant then fill in the buffer
00089                     o_specificQuadPts.push_back(_playerImpactPtsAllRallies[i]);
00090                 }
00091             }
00092         break;
00093 
00094         }
00095         // bottom right
00096         case 3:
00097         {
00098             for(int i=0;i<_playerImpactPtsAllRallies.size();i++)
00099             {
00100                 if((_playerImpactPtsAllRallies[i].x > _widthBounds) && (_playerImpactPtsAllRallies[i].y < _heightBounds))
00101                 {
00102                     // if it falls into the requested quadrant then fill in the buffer
00103                     o_specificQuadPts.push_back(_playerImpactPtsAllRallies[i]);
00104                 }
00105             }
00106             break;
00107 
00108         }
00109     }
00110 
00111 
00112     o_percentage = (float)((float)o_specificQuadPts.size()/(float)_playerImpactPtsAllRallies.size());
00113     o_percentage = o_percentage * 100;
00114 
00115 }
